title: Solaris(1972)-DVD-Russian,English,Hun(Magyar)
description:
Solaris Dvd Magyar (see on oininova ) from jocoka
is with remastered sound tracks but in version PAL. (Also it is 4% faster than cinema edition.)

Solaris (1972) - full Criterion restored edition 4231245 TPB - DVD / Film extra's 
is with excellent picture quality but only with 1 channel original Russian sound track.

Enjoy both remastered sound tracks (Russian and English) in AC3 5.1 and quality picture together!
Additionally English "director's comment" and Hungarian mono sound track in AC3 2.0 has been placed into this release.

Picture:
NTSC

Sound:
Russian AC3 5.1
English director's comment AC3 1.0
English AC3 5.1
Hungarian AC3 2.0 (mono)

Hungarian
